actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 to clarify the tax treatment of sale and leaseback transactions with respect to mass commuting vehicles.

summary.text: Amends the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 to prohibit the imposition of a State or local sales tax on a sale and leaseback arrangement involving a qualified mass commuting vehicle.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 to clarify the tax treatment of sale and leaseback transactions with respect to mass commuting vehicles.
